## TaskManager interface

Used to manage `task`<!-- -->s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TaskManager 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [context](./processor.taskmanager.context.md) | [Context](./processor.context.md) | The context of all <code>task</code>s. We can access it in [Task.action](./processor.task.action.md)<!-- -->. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [task(to)](./processor.taskmanager.task.md) | Gets the <code>task</code> corresponding to <code>to</code> in this <code>manager</code>. |
